bugs.title: Character inventory not syncing properly
bugs.description: When switching between characters, the inventory display shows items from the previous character until page refresh. This happens consistently when using the character selector in the top navigation.
stepsToReproduce: Log in with a character that has items in inventory
Switch to a different character using the character selector
Navigate to the inventory page
Observe that previous character's items are still displayed
bugs.expectedBehavior: Inventory should immediately update to show the current character's items
bugs.actualBehavior: Previous character's inventory is displayed until manual page refresh
bugs.adminNotes: Likely a state management issue in the character switching component. Need to investigate session handling.

internalLogs.author: DevTeam
internalLogs.note: Reproduced on dev environment. Investigating session state handling.

internalLogs.author: DevTeam
internalLogs.note: Found issue in character switching event handler. Missing inventory refresh call.

bugs.title: SWGDB search returns 500 error for special characters
bugs.description: Searching for items with special characters (like 'Jedi's Lightsaber' or 'N-1 Starfighter') in the SWGDB causes a 500 internal server error. Regular searches work fine.
stepsToReproduce: Navigate to SWGDB search page
Enter a search term with special characters (e.g., "Jedi's Lightsaber")
Press search or hit enter
Observe 500 error page
bugs.expectedBehavior: Search should handle special characters gracefully and return relevant results
bugs.adminNotes: SQL injection protection may be too aggressive. Need to review parameterized queries and escape handling.

internalLogs.author: BackendTeam
internalLogs.note: Error occurs in search query parsing. Special characters not properly escaped.

internalLogs.author: BackendTeam
internalLogs.note: Implementing proper parameterized queries for search function.

internalLogs.author: BackendTeam
internalLogs.note: Fix implemented, testing edge cases with various special characters.

bugs.title: Session timeout not properly handled
bugs.description: When a user's session expires, the application doesn't gracefully redirect to login. Instead, API calls fail silently and the user sees empty data or error messages without understanding why.
stepsToReproduce: Log in to the application
Leave the browser tab open for more than 2 hours (session timeout)
Try to perform any action that requires authentication
Observe the behavior
bugs.expectedBehavior: User should be redirected to login page with a clear message about session expiration
bugs.actualBehavior: API calls fail silently, user sees empty data or generic error messages
bugs.adminNotes: Need to implement proper session validation and automatic redirect handling. Should also add a session warning before timeout.

internalLogs.author: FrontendTeam
internalLogs.note: Issue confirmed. Missing proper 401 error handling in API interceptor.

bugs.title: Combat profile selector shows duplicate entries
bugs.description: The combat profile dropdown in the heroics section shows duplicate entries for some profiles. This seems to happen after importing new profiles or editing existing ones.
stepsToReproduce: Navigate to heroics combat section
Open the combat profile selector dropdown
Import a new combat profile
Refresh the dropdown
Observe duplicate entries
bugs.expectedBehavior: Each combat profile should appear only once in the dropdown list
bugs.actualBehavior: Some profiles appear multiple times in the list
bugs.adminNotes: Fixed by implementing proper profile deduplication logic and cache invalidation after profile operations.

internalLogs.author: CombatTeam
internalLogs.note: Reproduced issue. Profile cache not properly invalidated after import.

internalLogs.author: CombatTeam
internalLogs.note: Implemented profile deduplication and cache refresh logic.

internalLogs.author: CombatTeam
internalLogs.note: Testing completed. Fix verified working correctly.

resolution.author: CombatTeam
resolution.description: Implemented proper profile deduplication logic and cache invalidation. Profile dropdown now correctly displays unique entries.

bugs.title: Mobile responsiveness issues on bug report form
bugs.description: The bug report submission form is not properly responsive on mobile devices. Text areas are too small, buttons are difficult to tap, and the form doesn't fit properly on smaller screens.
stepsToReproduce: Open the bug report form on a mobile device
Try to fill out the description field
Attempt to scroll through form options
Try to submit the form
bugs.expectedBehavior: Form should be fully usable on mobile devices with appropriate sizing and spacing
bugs.actualBehavior: Text areas too small, buttons hard to tap, poor mobile layout
bugs.adminNotes: Need to review mobile CSS and implement better responsive design patterns for forms.

internalLogs.author: UITeam
internalLogs.note: Confirmed mobile layout issues. CSS grid not properly responsive.

internalLogs.author: UITeam
internalLogs.note: Working on responsive CSS updates and mobile-first design improvements.

bugs.title: Performance degradation in heroics loot tracker
bugs.description: The heroics loot tracker page becomes very slow when displaying large amounts of loot data (500+ items). Page takes 10+ seconds to load and scrolling is laggy.
stepsToReproduce: Navigate to heroics loot tracker
Load a character with extensive loot history (500+ items)
Observe page load time and scrolling performance
Try to filter or sort the loot list
bugs.expectedBehavior: Page should load quickly and provide smooth scrolling even with large datasets
bugs.actualBehavior: Slow page load (10+ seconds), laggy scrolling, unresponsive filtering
bugs.adminNotes: Need to implement virtualization for large lists and optimize data loading. Consider pagination or lazy loading.

bugs.title: Export function generates corrupted CSV files
bugs.description: When exporting character data or loot tables to CSV format, the generated files are corrupted and cannot be opened in Excel or other spreadsheet applications.
stepsToReproduce: Go to character data management
Select export to CSV option
Download the generated file
Try to open in Excel or Google Sheets
bugs.expectedBehavior: CSV file should be properly formatted and openable in spreadsheet applications
bugs.actualBehavior: File appears corrupted and cannot be opened
bugs.adminNotes: Likely encoding issue with special characters or incorrect CSV formatting. Need to review CSV generation library.

internalLogs.author: DataTeam
internalLogs.note: Investigating CSV encoding and format issues. Suspect UTF-8 BOM problem.

bugs.title: Discord webhook notifications not working
bugs.description: The Discord webhook integration for sending notifications about important events (boss kills, first kills, etc.) has stopped working. No notifications are being sent to the Discord channel.
stepsToReproduce: Trigger an event that should send Discord notification (e.g., boss kill)
Check Discord channel for notification
Review server logs for webhook calls
bugs.expectedBehavior: Discord notifications should be sent for configured events
bugs.actualBehavior: No Discord notifications are being sent
bugs.adminNotes: Fixed: Discord API token had expired. Updated with new token and implemented token refresh mechanism.

internalLogs.author: IntegrationTeam
internalLogs.note: Discord API returning 401 unauthorized. Token likely expired.

internalLogs.author: IntegrationTeam
internalLogs.note: Updated Discord token and implemented automatic token refresh.

worklog.description: Discord integration debugging and token update

resolution.author: IntegrationTeam
resolution.description: Updated expired Discord API token and implemented automatic token refresh mechanism to prevent future issues.

severities.description: System down, data loss, security breach
Major functionality broken, significant user impact

statuses.name: Open
statuses.description: Bug reported and confirmed, awaiting assignment

statuses.name: In Progress
statuses.description: Bug is being actively worked on

statuses.name: Resolved
statuses.description: Bug has been fixed and tested

statuses.name: Closed
statuses.description: Bug resolved and verified by reporter

statuses.name: Duplicate
statuses.description: Bug is a duplicate of another report
